file.name: authentication-jwt.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Authentication
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /authentication/jwt:
    post:
      tags:
        - Authentication
      summary: Login - JWT
      operationId: authenticationJwt
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                jwt:
                  $ref: './authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/jwt'
              required:
                - jwt
      responses:
        200:
          description: The new AccessToken
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/accessToken'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'
      security: []

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /authentication/jwt: post: operation "authenticationJwt": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: jwt: parse schema: reference "./authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/jwt": resolve reference "./authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/jwt": invalid schema reference "./authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/jwt"
